Geodata Functions

Source: R/gis.R
GIS.Rd

These are function to work with geographical data.

get_map(maptype = "postcodes4")

add_map(data, maptype = NULL, by = NULL, cut_northern_nl = TRUE)

is.sf(sf_data)

cut_northern_nl(sf_data)

filter_sf(sf_data, xmin = NULL, xmax = NULL, ymin = NULL, ymax = NULL)

filter_geolocation(sf_data, ..., col_zipcode = NULL)

latitude(sf_data)

longitude(sf_data)

Arguments

maptype

type of geometric data, must be one of: "gemeenten", "ggdregios", "nuts3", "postcodes2", "postcodes3", "postcodes4", "provincies". For add_map(), this is determined automatically if left blank.

data

data set to join left to the geodata

by

column to join by

cut_northern_nl

logical to keep only Northern Netherlands

sf_data

a data set of class 'sf'

xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax

coordination filters for sf_data

...

filters to set

col_zipcode

column with zip codes

Value

An sf model. The column with geodata is always called "geometry".

Details

cut_northern_nl() cuts any geometry on the northern three provinces of the Netherlands.

filter_sf() filters an sf object on coordinates, and is internally used by cut_northern_nl().

latitude() and longitude() return these specific geographic properties of sf_data.

Examples

library(sf)
#> Linking to GEOS 3.8.0, GDAL 3.0.4, PROJ 6.3.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE

get_map() # defaults to the geo_postcodes4 data set
#> Simple feature collection with 1060 features and 3 fields
#> Geometry type: GEOMETRY
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 4.845767 ymin: 52.58015 xmax: 7.227498 ymax: 53.55406
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84

data.frame(postcode = 7702, number_of_cases = 3) %>% 
  add_map()

#> Bounding box:  xmin: 4.845767 ymin: 52.58015 xmax: 7.227498 ymax: 53.55406

geo_provincies %>% cut_northern_nl()
#> Simple feature collection with 3 features and 3 fields
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 4.849817 ymin: 52.61225 xmax: 7.227498 ymax: 53.55523
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#>   provincie inwoners oppervlakte_km2                       geometry
#> 1   Drenthe   493590        2680.343 MULTIPOLYGON (((6.493505 53...
#> 2 Friesland   649965        3531.061 MULTIPOLYGON (((6.176871 53...
#> 3 Groningen   585840        2393.481 MULTIPOLYGON (((6.778757 53...
# filter on a latitude of 52.5 degrees and higher
geo_provincies %>% filter_sf(ymin = 52.5)
#> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 3 fields
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 4.849817 ymin: 52.61225 xmax: 7.09274 ymax: 53.51736
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#>   provincie inwoners oppervlakte_km2                       geometry
#> 1   Drenthe   493590        2680.343 MULTIPOLYGON (((6.493505 53...
#> 2 Friesland   649965        3531.061 MULTIPOLYGON (((6.176871 53...
if (require("certeplot2")) {

  geo_postcodes4 %>% 
    filter_geolocation(gemeente == "Tytsjerksteradiel") %>% 
    plot2(category = inwoners,
          datalabels = postcode)

}
#> Loading required package: certeplot2

latitude(geo_provincies)
#>  [1] 52.86228 52.52686 53.10846 52.06070 53.21675 51.20786 51.56101 52.58149
#>  [9] 52.44379 52.08348 51.45178 51.94913
longitude(geo_provincies)

#>  [9] 6.445325 5.163114 3.834927 4.477865
